data.name: Alice
data.text: 你这缩进大部分都没啥问题

post.text:
试验一下发现如果一行代码比较长，复制到树洞里缩进就会变的很乱啊，明明在spyder里写的时候还好好的，这个怎么解决
```python
headers={
         'Accept':"text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9",
         'Accept-Encoding':'gzip, deflate, br',
         'Accept-Language':"zh-CN,zh;q=0.9",
         'Cache-Control':"max-age=0",
         'Connection':"keep-alive",
         'Cookie':"UM_distinctid=173d30553d544e-05e8d2425a679e-3323765-e1000-173d30553d64cf; __51cke__=; ASPSESSIONIDAWAADQTB=NIFBIBABGHEHMNBIFLHHLOJI; CNZZDATA1278618868=278254405-1596971648-https%253A%252F%252Fwww.baidu.com%252F%7C1603939602; __tins__20641871=%7B%22sid%22%3A%201603939974060%2C%20%22vd%22%3A%2020%2C%20%22expires%22%3A%201603942451275%7D; __51laig__=71",
         'Host':"www.xiurenji.com",
         'Sec-Fetch-Dest':"document",
         'Sec-Fetch-Mode':"navigate",
         'Sec-Fetch-Site':"none",
         'Sec-Fetch-User':"?1",
         'Upgrade-Insecure-Requests':"1",
         'User-Agent':"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.111 Safari/537.36",
         }```
